summary: Palermo is a historic city in Sicily, Italy, known for its rich culture and architecture. Founded over 2,700 years ago by the Phoenicians, it has been ruled by various civilizations, including the Greeks, Romans, Arabs, and Normans. The city was once the capital of the Emirate of Sicily and later the Kingdom of Sicily. Today, Palermo is Sicily's cultural and economic hub, famous for its delicious food, beautiful churches, and lively markets. It attracts tourists with its Mediterranean climate and is home to a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
title: Palermo
